key.name: recording-duration
key.description: Maximum recording duration in seconds (10 seconds to 5 minutes)

key.name: copy-to-clipboard
key.description: Copy transcribed text to clipboard in addition to typing it

key.name: skip-preview-x11
key.description: If enabled (X11 only), the extension will insert the transcribed text immediately after recording, without showing the preview dialog. Has no effect on Wayland.

key.name: first-run
key.description: Indicates if this is the first time the extension is being run
